text: Mallory Airport is a private-use airport located three miles (5 km) southwest of the central business district of South Charleston, in Kanawha County, West Virginia, United States. It is privately owned by Ben F. Mallory. == Airlines == No airlines are scheduled at this airport. == Facilities and aircraft == Mallory Airport has one asphalt paved runway (15/33) measuring 1,904 x 24 ft. (580 x 7 m). There are 70 aircraft based at this airport: 98% single-engine, 2% multi-engine.Ben Mallory There is a flight school that has operated continuously since 1953. == References == == External links == *official site * * Category:Airports in West Virginia Category:Transportation in Kanawha County, West Virginia Category:Buildings and structures in Kanawha County, West Virginia
title: Mallory Airport
